name: rabbitmq-skill
title: RabbitMQ Message Queue
description: Professional RabbitMQ message queue operations including queue management, exchanges, routing, bindings, RPC patterns, and dead letter handling. Use when working with RabbitMQ brokers, implementing message routing patterns, building microservices communication, or setting up reliable message delivery systems.
author: godlike-kimi-skills

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Action to perform: declare_queue, delete_queue, publish, consume, declare_exchange, bind

commands.declare_queue: Declare a new queue with optional parameters
commands.publish: Publish a message to an exchange or queue
commands.declare_exchange: Declare an exchange with specified type
commands.bind: Create binding between queue and exchange
